title: High ion barrier hydrogel with excellent toughness achieved by directional structures
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,27555-27564

Zezhou Yang, Zhiyu Zhao, Dongsheng Yang, Liangyu Zhu, Zirou Qiu, Yifan Wu, Cheng Lan, Wenchuan Jiang, Geng Li, Bin Zhong, Jin Wei, Tao Liu, Heping Xie
Parallel pore channel-oriented structures were constructed in the PVA hydrogel through directional freezing and salting out, leading to enhanced barrier properties.
